general.text: The General section provides identifying information about the motif including cartoon, motif ID, name and synonyms.
general.title: General

glycans.text: The Glycans With This Motif section provides a list of glycans in which the motif is present.
glycans.title: Glycans With This Motif

history.text: The History section provides information about the release in which the accession was introduced, whether it was renamed from other accessions, or merged with another motif in GlyGen.
history.title: History

cross_references.text: The Cross References section provides a list of database entries and links for the motif in other databases.
cross_references.title: Cross References

digital_sequence.text: The Digital Sequence section displays the sequence of the motif in various sequence formats.
digital_sequence.title: Digital Sequence

publications.text: The Publications section contains publications where the given motif was reported.
publications.title: Publications
